verses.verse: Woe<WH1945> to them that are at ease<WH7600> in Zion<WH6726>, and trust<WH982> in the mountain<WH2022> of Samaria<WH8111>, which are named<WH5344> chief<WH7225> of the nations<WH1471>, to whom the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> came<WH935>!

Pass<WH5674> you unto Calneh<WH3641>, and see<WH7200>; and from there go<WH3212> you to Hamath<WH2574> the great<WH7227>: then go down<WH3381> to Gath<WH1661> of the Philistines<WH6430>: are they better<WH2896> than these kingdoms<WH4467>? or their border<WH1366> greater<WH7227> than your border<WH1366>?
You that put far away<WH5077> the evil<WH7451> day<WH3117>, and cause the seat<WH7675> of violence<WH2555> to come near<WH5066>;

That lie<WH7901> upon beds<WH4296> of ivory<WH8127>, and stretch<WH5628> themselves upon their couches<WH6210>, and eat<WH398> the lambs<WH3733> out of the flock<WH6629>, and the calves<WH5695> out of the midst<WH8432> of the stall<WH4770>;
That chant<WH6527> to the sound<WH6310> of the viol<WH5035>, and invent<WH2803> to themselves instruments<WH3627> of music<WH7892>, like David<WH1732>;

That drink<WH8354> wine<WH3196> in bowls<WH4219>, and anoint<WH4886> themselves with the chief<WH7225> ointments<WH8081>: but they are not grieved<WH2470> for the affliction<WH7667> of Joseph<WH3130>.
Therefore now shall they go captive<WH1540> with the first<WH7218> that go captive<WH1540>, and the banquet<WH4797> of them that stretched<WH5628> themselves shall be removed<WH5493>.

The Lord<WH136> God<WH3069> has sworn<WH7650> by himself<WH5315>, says<WH5002> the Lord<WH3068> the God<WH430> of hosts<WH6635>, I abhor<WH8374> the excellency<WH1347> of Jacob<WH3290>, and hate<WH8130> his palaces<WH759>: therefore will I deliver up<WH5462> the city<WH5892> with all that is in it<WH4393>.
And it shall come to pass<WH3498>, if there remain ten<WH6235> men<WH582> in one<WH259> house<WH1004>, that they shall die<WH4191>.

And a man<WH1730>'s uncle shall take him up<WH5375>, and he that burns<WH5635> him<WH3318>, to bring out the bones<WH6106> out of the house<WH1004>, and shall say<WH559> unto him that is by the sides<WH3411> of the house<WH1004>, Is there yet any with you<WH559>? and he shall say, No<WH657>. Then shall he say<WH559>, Hold your tongue<WH2013>: for we may not make mention<WH2142> of the name<WH8034> of the Lord<WH3068>.
For<WH3068>, behold, the Lord commanded<WH6680>, and he will strike<WH5221> the great<WH1419> house<WH1004> with breaches<WH7447>, and the little<WH6996> house<WH1004> with clefts<WH1233>.

Shall horses<WH5483> run<WH7323> upon the rock<WH5553>? will one plow<WH2790> there with oxen<WH1241>? for you have turned<WH2015> judgment<WH4941> into gall<WH7219>, and the fruit<WH6529> of righteousness<WH6666> into hemlock<WH3939>:
You which rejoice<WH8056> in a thing<WH1697> of nothing<WH3808>, which say<WH559>, Have we not taken<WH3947> to us horns<WH7161> by our own strength<WH2392>?

But<WH6965>, behold, I will raise up against you a nation<WH1471>, O house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>, says<WH5002> the Lord<WH3068> the God<WH430> of hosts<WH6635>; and they shall afflict<WH3905> you from the entering in<WH935> of Hemath<WH2574> unto the river<WH5158> of the wilderness<WH6160>.
